text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters You know what's interesting? @PressSec retweets a lot when she's caught in lies that video captures. Like when she said Trump was only being "satirical" when he referred to #COVID19 as the Kung Flu. She actually thinks it's a fucking joke.
